text: Taxi 2 (also called Taxi Taxi) is a French comedy film directed by Gérard Krawczyk and released in March 2000. Starring Samy Naceri, Frédéric Diefenthal and Marion Cotillard. It is a sequel to Taxi, written by Luc Besson and directed by Gérard Pirès in 1998. It was followed by Taxi 3 in January 2003.
